tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Red One
programme.desc: Festive action-adventure comedy film. The North Poles head of security must save Santa.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: The ups and downs of love for different couples, from the prime minister to a porn actor.

programme.title: HM The King
programme.desc: His Majesty King Charles III delivers his annual Christmas message to the nation.

programme.title: The Royal Variety Performance 2025
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the 2025 edition of the event including performances from the musical Les Miserables, the cast of Dead Ringers, and Harry Moulding.

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Fletchers Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. The family finally move back onto the farm after months of hard work, and the barn is transformed for a wedding to remember and a heart-warming seasonal close.

programme.title: Love Your Christmas with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm for this festive foray are the cast of Call the Midwife, Endeavour star Roger Allam, Tom Chambers and Christmas music from Lee Mead.

programme.title: James Martins Christmas Day
programme.desc: Its Christmas Day 2025 down in Hampshire, and James is spending the big day with guests including former supermodel Jodie Kidd and presenter and Loose Women star Gloria Hunniford.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Animated adventure film. An ogre sets out on a quest to rescue a princess from a curse.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Kempton
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents racing from Kempton, Aintree and Wetherby - the feature meeting is at Kempton with three Grade One races including the traditional King George VI Chase.

programme.title: Bullseye Christmas Special
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff hosts a festive special of the classic darts-based game show and is joined by former world champion Mighty Michael van Gerwen for a charity challenge.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Classic Oscar-winning action-adventure film sequel. Indiana Jones pursues a sacred rock.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon feels uneasy, someone has a big decision to make, and Jacob is not happy.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: As the residents reel from the events of Christmas Day, Evelyn finds somebody unconscious after being attacked - meanwhile, Theos treat presents Todd with an awkward dilemma.

programme.title: The Masked Singer Christmas Special
programme.desc: Joel Dommett hosts a Yuletide edition as four panto legends try to help Mo Gilligan, Davina McCall, Maya Jama and Jonathan Ross identify four huge celebrities.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Christmas Special
programme.desc: Settle in for a festive edition where famous faces - including Celebrity Traitor Joe Marler and comedian Katherine Ryan - join Jeremy Clarkson.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Bond film. 007 looks into a North Korean terrorists plot involving a space weapon.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: How Jaws Changed the World
programme.desc: This documentary shows what weve learned about sharks since the film Jaws was released.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Sara Davies Christmas Craft Off
programme.desc: Sara Davies puts Tameka Empson and Rosie Ramsey to the festive test with angels, tablescapes, bow-making and gift-wrapping accompanied by surprises and a party.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team of gardening experts surprise a fellow landscape gardener with Alzheimers by building a modern family garden.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James Great British Adventure draws to a close as he heads for Devon to hook up with old mate Michael Caines, who just happens to be a Michelin-starred chef...

programme.title: John and Lisas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: John and Lisa have got Christmas covered with some classic dishes to serve up for the festive season that include two family recipes they cannot wait to share with us.

programme.title: Ainsleys Festive Flavours
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott returns to his festive kitchen and whips up Christmas cheer alongside Sara Davies, Josie Gibson, and Paul Ainsworth while Jonathan Phang also joins in the fun.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning at Christmas
programme.desc: James celebrates Christmas at his home in the Hampshire countryside by serving up a feast of festive food for Strictly Come Dancing star Shirley Ballas.

programme.title: John and Lisas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: John and Lisa present an ideal Twixmas menu with dishes that include a Christmas spiced apple and ginger cheesecake with popping candy to start any New Year with a bang.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Kempton
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents racing from Kempton and Chepstow - the feature race is the 2025 Welsh National at Chepstow that features one of the biggest handicap prizes of the season.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: Classic Oscar-winning action-adventure film sequel. Indiana Jones pursues the Holy Grail.

programme.title: You Bet! On Tour Christmas Special
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern heads to Cambridgeshire for a festive special as Alison Hammond, Rob Beckett, and Nick Mohammed place their bets on some extraordinary challenges.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune Christmas Special
programme.desc: Graham Norton hosts a festive special as dad and daughter Craig and Erin - and mum and daughter duos Sue and Kaye and Sheesh and Suki - compete to win 50,000 pounds.

programme.title: Ant and Decs Limitless Win Christmas Special
programme.desc: Ant and Dec spread the Christmas joy by surprising two audience members with the chance to take on the Limitless Ladder alongside celebrity teammates.

programme.title: The Hunting Wives
programme.desc: The first episode of a thrilling mystery drama. After moving to Texas, Sophie and Graham ONeil attend a party where Sophie meets the Hunting Wives.

programme.title: The Hunting Wives
programme.desc: Thrilling mystery drama. Jed considers a run for governor as Margo works to protect their privacy, and Sophie faces her past while rebuilding confidence.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the 2025 Boxing Day fixtures in the Football League including Coventry City v Swansea City, Leicester City v Watford, and Millwall v Ipswich Town in the Championship.
